snippet: This season the major men’s wear brands, from Hermès to Salvatore Ferragamo, offer fresh takes on a garment with a terrific heritage.
abstract: Men's trench coats in varied proportions and fabrics update a classic look this season.
lead_paragraph: This season the major men’s wear brands, from Hermès to Salvatore Ferragamo, offer fresh takes on a garment with a terrific heritage.

headline.main: A New Life for the Classic Trench Coat
